name: Egg Over It: Fall Flat From the Top
name_original: Egg Over It: Fall Flat From the Top
description:
WELCOME TO THIS ADVENTURE


Take on a real tactical jumping adventure with Egg Over It!!! A challenge where you will have to lift the egg to the top in search of its origin, but explore carefully; a single failed jump could lead to a long fall.

Guide it through sewers, buildings, aerial vehicles and skyscrapers.

FEATURES

  • Climb the egg to the top.
  • Perform aerial moves.
  • Walk to be more precise.
  • Play using only impulses.

A LITTLE MORE ABOUT EGG OVER IT

  • Avoid making a wrong move or you will fall into the sewers starting from the beginning.
  • Remember that the egg is ovoid, so its shape may play a trick on you.
  • See the scenery with a day and night cycle.
  • Enjoy the most Andalusian music composed with Spanish guitar.
  • Let the game's narration envelop you during the game.
  • Illo, will you have the balls to beat this game?


Download Egg Over it now, a game where the only way to advance is up.
